situation.title: Entrance exams
situation.meta_description: Information on the admission process to high schools and universities.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

The final form of entrance exams has not been established yet.Â Right now it is assumed that the entrance exams will go forward as usual with the in-person presence of the students at the exam.

This could change, based on the development of the epidemiological situation. Any changes or new information will be updated on this website.

It is also important to monitor the information released by the school that you are applying to. Specifically the information from the academic department related to the date and form of the exams and the hygienic regulations surrounding them.

We are all going through a difficult time right now, if you need any psychological help or tips on how to cope with stress, look in the section on Stress and handling the impacts of the pandemic.
